General.Name: Dharma Polimetal Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells automotive components for motorcycles and cars in Indonesia. The company offers metal-based, plastic injection, and cable control automotive components, as well as wiring harness, and various battery products. Its products portfolio includes grabrailm swing arm, frame body, side stand, main stand, steering handle, and muffler; powerace boxes, powerace max, and powerace new assy EV; suspension member, windshield header, steering hanger beam, insulator exhaust, hood lock, member apron, axle torsion beam, body lower, and back inner and outer; and fasteners and bicycles. The company's products also comprise main harness, USB charging, sub harness battery, and speedometer harness; reverse parking sensor, engine hood security alarm, rear seat entertainment, back and corner sensor, and head unit; double seat, cover and fender front, and protector muffler; cover radiator grill, front and rear bumper side; and electrical, accessories, and engine parts. It also provides throttle, speedometer, front break, backdoor, fuel lid, and hood lock cable; precision parts; carbide cutting tools, inspection jigs, special purpose machine, ventilator, diamond cutting tools, dies, universal robot, and single parts; and converter and frame sub assy, pipe exhaust tile, and door sash comp, as well as tail gate, door and floor harness. PT Dharma Polimetal Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Cikarang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Angsana Raya Blok A9, Cikarang, Indonesia, 17550
